title: Button: icon button positive
code:
<gds-flex gap="s" padding="xl">
  <gds-button variant="positive">
    <gds-icon-arrow-right></gds-icon-arrow-right>
  </gds-button>
  <gds-button variant="positive" rank="secondary">
    <gds-icon-arrow-right></gds-icon-arrow-right>
  </gds-button>
  <gds-button variant="positive" rank="tertiary">
    <gds-icon-arrow-right></gds-icon-arrow-right>
  </gds-button>
</gds-flex>
